domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @BarackObama Hey partna! Easter is good and all, but we loving through covid-19 fam. Everyone has to go above and beyond. Retired nurses and doctors are going back to work. Time for you to do the same. Enjoy your day today, but time to get back to work tomorrow. The world needs you.
